New Records: Surya Kumar Yadav became the world's number one batsman in T20 Cricket.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 64 runs off 44 balls.
KL Rahul scored 50 runs off 32 balls.
Litton Das scored 60 runs off 27 balls for Bangladesh.
Hasan Mahmud took 3 wickets for Bangladesh.
Shakib Al Hasan took 2 wickets for Bangladesh.
Arshdeep Singh and Hardik Pandya each took 2 wickets for India.
Rain interrupted the match, leading to a revised target for Bangladesh.
Post-Match Reflections: Virender Sehwag complimented Indian bowlers on their comeback.
Mohammad Shami praised the team's character for the win.
KL Rahul reacted positively after his performance.
Surya Kumar Yadav expressed gratitude over becoming the world's number one batsman in T20 Cricket.
Dinesh Karthik described the game as having an exhilarating atmosphere.
Sachin Tendulkar congratulated Team India on its win.
Virat Kohli reacted to the win against Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 16 overs per side.
